description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: questions of mutual defence were theme of discussions with six European countries in Bonn; the history of the famous city of Mainz on the Rhine River; new control and radio system for the German Federal Railroad; The Leica camera manufactured in the old imperial city of Wetzlar and how the Leica looks today; "Youth Makes Music" contest, racing yachts ride the waves on the Baltic and North Seas.
